message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable.
Let's try 55/45, it's more reasonable for me.
I need a better deal than that, Bob. Time is running out, and the value is decreasing. 62/38 is my offer.
I'm willing to compromise, 58/42 is my new offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm increasing my offer slightly to show I'm willing to negotiate, but this is the best you'll get. 63/37, take it or leave it.
I'm not backing down, 60/40 is my counteroffer.
Okay, Bob, you're being stubborn. Let's stop wasting time. I'm going back to my initial offer of 60/40.  We both lose if this falls through.
